name: lepidopterist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who studies butterflies and moths (= flying insects with large wings): His father was a keen lepidopterist and had a large collection of butterflies and moths.
More examplesFewer examplesRed admirals, painted ladies, and American ladies are present in numbers lepidopterists find astounding.One of our most distinguished lepidopterists, she notes that the butterfly has often been seen as a symbol of the soul.Lepidopterists generally stay away from San Francisco because of the frequent fogs.
